parameters.name: ApiIds
parameters.description: The API ID for the specified operation. Separate multiple API IDs with commas (,). A maximum of 100 API IDs can be entered.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the API group to which the API that you want to manage belongs.

parameters.name: SignatureId
parameters.description: The ID of the signature key.

parameters.name: StageName
parameters.description:
The name of the runtime environment. Valid values:

*   **RELEASE**
*   **PRE**
*   **TEST**
